```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(lme4)
library(Matrix)
```

```{r}
data<-read.csv("walmart.csv")
```

### Null model

```{r}
mean_weekly_sales <-mean(data$Weekly_Sales, na.rm = TRUE)
var_weekly_sales <- var(data$Weekly_Sales, na.rm = TRUE)
cat("Weekly Sales - Mean:", mean_weekly_sales, "Variance:", var_weekly_sales, "\n")
```

### multilevel model

```{r}
model1 <- lmer(Weekly_Sales ~ 1 + (1 | Store), data = data)
summary(model1)
```
